医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
密歇根大学研究人员开发出无动物方法来生产大脑类器官密歇根大学的研究人员开发出一种人工培育微型大脑的方法；称为人脑类器官-；不含动物细胞，可以极大地改善神经退行性疾病的研究和最终治疗的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UM-researchers-develop-animal-free-method-to- Produce-brain-organoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/UM-researchers-develop-animal-free-method-to- Produce-brain-organoids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90ecc32c-a178-4901-a395-d09b205a24d5 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 11:37:14 -0400 U-M researchers develop animal-free method to produce brain organoids
开发全息数字人体模型来破译人类生命和健康的密码一项旨在彻底改变生命科学领域并提供对人体前所未有的见解的突破性研究项目已经宣布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Developing-a-holography-digital-mannequin-to-decipher-the-code-of- human-life-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Developing-a-holographic-digital-mannequin-to-decipher-the-code-of- human-life-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb40632-3d22-4fe1-ae95-3614558f20ac Thu, 13 Jul 2023 11:06:00 -0400 Developing a holographic digital mannequin to decipher the code of human life and health
纳米生物技术的伦理：呼吁全球监管假肢被思想所感动。侵袭性脑癌的靶向治疗。具有增强视力或仿生耳朵的士兵。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/The-ethics-of-nanobiotechnology-A-call-for-global-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/The-ethics-of-nanobiotechnology-A-call-for-global-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db76fe3a-284c-4fa2-a6f5-9c30f1868ead Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:56:30 -0400 The ethics of nanobiotechnology: A call for global regulation
英国神经科学家因其对痴呆症研究的贡献而荣获 Hartwig Piepenbrock-DZNE 奖今年的“Hartwig Piepenbrock-DZNE 奖”奖金为 60,000 欧元，授予英国神经科学家艾莉森·戈特 (Alison Goate)，哲学博士。该奖项旨在表彰她对阿尔茨海默病和额颞叶痴呆研究的杰出贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/British-neuroscientist-wins-Hartwig-Piepenbrock-DZNE-Prize-for-contributions-to-dementia-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/British-neuroscientist-wins-Hartwig-Piepenbrock-DZNE-Prize-for-contributions-to-dementia-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88cfd595-26f2-406e-acf4-b605cde01069 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:50:02 -0400 British neuroscientist wins Hartwig Piepenbrock-DZNE Prize for contributions to dementia research
通过生物信息学方法检测临床样本中的抗生素耐药基因研究探索了宏基因组下一代测序比对方法在识别具有抗生素耐药性的细菌群体中的效用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Detection-of-antibiotic-resistance-genes-in-clinical-samples-through-bioinformatic-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Detection-of-antibiotic-resistance-genes-in-clinical-samples-through-bioinformatic-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd6a3074-d17e-463b-b496-612044181091 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:48:00 -0400 Detection of antibiotic resistance genes in clinical samples through bioinformatic approaches
绿茶化合物可能为子宫肌瘤提供新的治疗选择在约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的一项临床前概念验证研究中，研究人员发现表没食子儿茶素没食子酸酯（EGCG）是一种具有强大抗氧化特性的绿茶化合物，有望用于治疗和预防子宫肌瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Green-tea-compound-may-offer-new-treatment-option-for-uterine-filoid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Green-tea-compound-may-offer-new-treatment-option-for-uterine-filaids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77b98d05-850a-4b8f-97e9-c6a618fc5019 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:46:56 -0400 Green tea compound may offer new treatment option for uterine fibroids
新研究揭示肺部肿瘤如何产生耐药性在过去的二十年中，针对肿瘤中特定遗传异常的癌症疗法彻底改变了治疗的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-study-reveals-how-lung-tumors-develop-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-study-reveals-how-lung-tumors-develop-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc5ae720-4b2e-42ea-8c44-768786a5e7e2 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:31:17 -0400 New study reveals how lung tumors develop drug resistance
